positions.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
highlights: Develop custom components for Autodesk.com and dynamic email templates using Java, JavaScript, HTML/Sightly, CSS/SASS, AEM, React, and other technologies

Collaborate with marketing teams to develop and optimize A/B tests on user-facing, interactive experiences, achieving improvements in conversion (up to 7%), billings (up to 24%), and engagement (up to 12%)
Test developed code using testing frameworks including JUnit, Jest, and Cypress for unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, maintaining code coverage of 90% or higher
Perform PR reviews for teammates, providing feedback on best practices to uphold code quality standards
Optimize internal tools for content producers and developers, streamlining workflows and accelerating the delivery of engaging, user-focused features
Act as de facto tech lead on 2 major projects, making technical decisions and coordinating with product, design, UX, and content-production teams

Champion cross-functional collaboration by leading agile ceremonies for a team of 12 developers and stakeholders, establishing connections between organizations, and incorporating early stakeholder input
Establish a knowledge base repository to facilitate information and documentation sharing between developers, with 6300+ views across 85 pages with 22 unique contributors
Mentor 4 junior developers in modern development practices and career growth
Organize and execute communication campaigns, event planning, member surveys, volunteer coordination, and advocacy as a board member of the LGBTQ+ employee resource group

positions.title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: Developed mobile-first components for React websites on WordPress using GraphQL and Gatsby
Used Express to develop an API responsible for the migration of 3000+ blog posts
Built and styled responsive customer-facing web pages with modern CSS and JavaScript, adhering to strict regulatory requirements for design, content, and accessibility
Collaborated with UX and design teams to determine project strategy
